Verses: 1 enakku Irangum, Dhevane, Enakku Irangum; Ummai En Aaththumaa Andikkollugiradhu; Vikkinangal Kadandhupogumattum Umadhu Settaigalin Nizhalile Vandhu Adaiven.
2 enakkaaga Yaavaiyum Seydhu Mudikkappogira Dhevanaagiya Unnadhamaana Dhevanai Nokkik Kooppiduven.
3 ennai Vizhungappaarkkiravan Ennai Nindhikkaiyil, Avar Paralogaththilirundhu Oththaasai Anuppi, Ennai Ratchippaar. (selaa.) Dhevan Thamadhu Kirubaiyaiyum Thamadhu Saththiyaththaiyum Anuppuvaar.
4 en Aaththumaa Singangalin Naduvilirukkiradhu; Theeyai Iraikkira Manupuththirarukkulle Kidakkiren; Avargal Parkal Eettigalum Ambugalum, Avargal Naavu Karukkaana Pattayamumaayirukkiradhu.
5 dhevane, Vaanangalukku Melaaga Uyarndharulum; Umadhu Magimai Boomiyanaiththinmelum Uyarndhiruppadhaaga.
6 en Kaalgalukkuk Kanniyai Vaiththirukkiraargal; En Aaththumaa Thoindhupoyitru; Enakku Munbaagak Kuzhiyai Vetti, Adhin Naduvile Vizhundhaargal. (selaa.)
7 en Irudhayam Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu; Dhevane, En Irudhayam Aayaththamaayirukkiradhu; Naan Paadikkeerththanampannuven.
8 en Magimaiye, Vizhi; Veenaiye, Suramandalame, Vizhiyungal; Adhikaalaiyil Vizhiththukkolven.
9 aandavare, Janangalukkulle Ummaith Thudhippen; Jaadhigalukkulle Ummaik Keerththanampannuven.
10 umadhu Kirubai Vaanabariyandhamum, Umadhu Saththiyam Megamandalangalbariyandhamum Ettugiradhu.
11 dhevane, Vaanangalukkumelaaga Uyarndharulum; Umadhu Magimai Boomiyanaiththinmelum Uyarndhiruppadhaaga.
